data.title: New year weekend rugby
data.meta_description: All the match officials for the Premiership and Championship in England, Top 14 in France, and the URC across Europe and South Africa [...]
data.text:
Only a few of the leagues are seeing any rugby action this weekend and the referees will either be hoping for early finishes (on New Year’s Eve) or laying off the celebrations ahead of a New Year’s Day run around. We have all the referee, AR and TMO appointments for the Premiership in England, the URC and the Top 14 in France.

One appointment of special note is in Italy where the match between Zebre Parma and Benetton will see a URC refereeing debut for Federico Vedovelli (pic top right). The S&C coach (for a leading Volleyball team in Northern Italy) will need to be on point for this one! Good luck!

Former Gloucester pro player, Nick Wood (bottom left) will oversee the RFU Championship derby in SW London as London Scottish play Richmond – the only match being played in that league. Elsewhere we have a full list in the Gallagher Premiership where Luke Pearce (top left) is action looking after the Saints v Quins tie up. In France, the Top14 has a full round of matches. Adrien Descottes will be refereeing in Lyon as they host Brive who’ll be hoping for a win to haul themselves off the bottom of the league.

Happy New Year to you all!

Keith

England: Gallagher Premiership – round 14

Sale Sharks v Leicester Tigers

Referee: Matthew Carley

ARs: Greg Macdonald & Peter Allan

TMO: Claire Hodnett

Citing Officer: Shaun Gallagher

Bath Rugby v Newcastle Falcons

Referee: Jack Makepeace

ARs: Anthony Woodthorpe & Jonathan Healy

TMO: David Rose

Citing Officer: Greg Garner

Saracens v Exeter Chiefs

Referee: Craig Maxwell-Keys

ARs: Dan Jones & Phil Watters

TMO: Rowan Kitt

Citing Officer: Buster White

Gloucester Rugby v London Irish

Referee: Adam Leal

ARs: Simon Harding & George Selwood

TMO: Andrew Jackson

Citing Officer: Tony Diprose

ASM Clermont v Stade Toulousain
